org.ocast.sdk.core

Interface EventListener


  • public EventListener

    Represents a listener of OCast protocol events.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  EventListener.DefaultImpls
      Represents a listener of OCast protocol events.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onCustomEvent(Device device, java.lang.String name, java.lang.String params)
      Tells the listener that a custom event from a web application was sent by a device.
      void onMediaMetadataChanged(Device device, MediaMetadata mediaMetadata)
      Tells the listener that a media metadata changed event was sent by a device.
      void onMediaPlaybackStatus(Device device, MediaPlaybackStatus mediaPlaybackStatus)
      Tells the listener that a media playback status event was sent by a device.
      void onUpdateStatus(Device device, UpdateStatus updateStatus)
      Tells the listener that a firmware update status event was sent by a device.

    • Method Detail

      • onMediaPlaybackStatus

        void onMediaPlaybackStatus(@NotNull
                           Device device,
                           @NotNull
                           MediaPlaybackStatus mediaPlaybackStatus)

        Tells the listener that a media playback status event was sent by a device.

        This event is sent at a rate defined by the frequency parameter of the prepare command.

        Parameters:
        device - The device that sent the event.
        mediaPlaybackStatus - The playback status of the current media.

      • onMediaMetadataChanged

        void onMediaMetadataChanged(@NotNull
                            Device device,
                            @NotNull
                            MediaMetadata mediaMetadata)

        Tells the listener that a media metadata changed event was sent by a device.

        Parameters:
        device - The device that sent the event.
        mediaMetadata - The changed media metadata.

      • onUpdateStatus

        void onUpdateStatus(@NotNull
                    Device device,
                    @NotNull
                    UpdateStatus updateStatus)

        Tells the listener that a firmware update status event was sent by a device.

        This event is sent each seconds when downloading a new firmware, otherwise when state changes.

        Parameters:
        device - The device that sent the event.
        updateStatus - The firmware update status of the device.

      • onCustomEvent

        void onCustomEvent(@NotNull
                   Device device,
                   @NotNull
                   java.lang.String name,
                   @NotNull
                   java.lang.String params)

        Tells the listener that a custom event from a web application was sent by a device.

        Parameters:
        device - The device that sent the event.
        name - The name of the web application where the event originated.
        params - The parameters of the event.
